fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries

Interface BatteriesCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BatteriesImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatteriesConnector, BatteriesInboundPort, BatteriesOutboundPort

    public interface BatteriesCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, BatteriesImplementationI
    The component interface BatteriesCI defines the signatures of the services that are offered by batteries compoennts.

    Description

    Invariants

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean areCharging()
      return true if the batteries are currently charging and false otherwise.
      boolean areDischarging()
      return true if the batteries are currently discharging and false otherwise.
      SignalData<java.lang.Double> chargeLevel()
      return current charge level of the batteries in proportion of the current capacity.
      SignalData<java.lang.Double> currentCapacity()
      return the current capacity of the batteries.
      Measure<java.lang.Double> nominalCapacity()
      return the nominal capacity of the batteries in AmpH.

      void stopCharging()
